chapter.dtd.2C7CD96E7B718AD9.title: Return to the Sands
quest.dtd.1394E8B5F06BD3BC.title: Enter the Atum
quest.dtd.1394E8B5F06BD3BC.subtitle: Never desert you
quest.dtd.1394E8B5F06BD3BC.description.4: 2.Second floor:There is a 5*5 circle, and a space of 3*3 is left inside.
quest.dtd.1394E8B5F06BD3BC.description.5: 3.Third floor: 2 sandstones on each of the four feet.
quest.dtd.1394E8B5F06BD3BC.description.8: Note: Atum villagers have been banned from spawning. You can't trade with them.
quest.dtd.3DE4C2C73D2A00B3.title: Welcome to the world of dates
quest.dtd.2439902F2D6F6BB2.subtitle: blingbling!
quest.dtd.2439902F2D6F6BB2.description.1: Smelt the rainbow ores from good dream dimension to get rainbow ingots.
quest.dtd.2439902F2D6F6BB2.description.2: Kill Herobrine or mine deeply to get negatite gems.
quest.dtd.38627C6F9EE5E7CE.title: Find a pyramid
quest.dtd.38627C6F9EE5E7CE.description.1: It's most likely half in the sands, so you may need to clean it up (torches are great for sand removal)
quest.dtd.1BA9A54852C59A1C.title: integrity!
quest.dtd.1BA9A54852C59A1C.subtitle: You can get nebu drops by killing the mobs in atum
quest.dtd.1BA9A54852C59A1C.description.1: Nebu Ores? It may take you 10,000 years to mine it.
quest.dtd.12324718DAC8D60E.subtitle: Burn the equipment of the pharaohs...
quest.dtd.12324718DAC8D60E.description.1: Godforge   Put the lava bucket below, put the pharaoh loot on it, and burn out the godshards.
quest.dtd.3B78D94F8D2F3B31.title: Find the two quandary blocks on the door of pyramid
quest.dtd.3B78D94F8D2F3B31.subtitle: Use nebu torches to right click on the two quandary blocks to open the pyramid door
quest.dtd.2EA516D3529887CC.title: Observe all trap blocks in the pyramid
quest.dtd.2EA516D3529887CC.subtitle: Right click on traps with a pickaxe to close them
task.dtd.4419E201F4913CB4.title: Burning trap
task.dtd.0FC349A69868C748.title: Poison trap
task.dtd.1B3DACF77BA93247.title: Tar trap
task.dtd.6D6FA3CAF4A7D6C3.title: Smoke trap
task.dtd.57C9A8792711575D.title: Arrow trap
quest.dtd.26934471A6092B79.title: Pyramid guardians
quest.dtd.60463927EADC0F6F.title: Submit dates
quest.dtd.61B078A76B3E67F5.subtitle: Kill the king
quest.dtd.61B078A76B3E67F5.description.1: You can find four quandary blocks around the sarcophagus
quest.dtd.61B078A76B3E67F5.description.2: Set nebu torches on the four quandary blocks, and then right click at the sarcophagus to summon a pharaoh
quest.dtd.61B078A76B3E67F5.description.3: After killing it, go back to the sarcophagus and right click to open it.
quest.dtd.61B078A76B3E67F5.description.4: Put the pharaoh artifacts to your inventory and then you gain access to the nether.
quest.dtd.61B078A76B3E67F5.description.5: What? The pharaoh is hard to defeat? Put your boats down!
quest.dtd.4C2313F4ABEE4BD2.subtitle: sliding lid!
reward.dtd.5FDB1C361589DECA.title: Pharaoh scepter(survival mode unavailable)
quest.5657A8DF5388FB3F.title: Law enforcement impartially
quest.5657A8DF5388FB3F.subtitle: Bring the leaders of robbers to justice
quest.5657A8DF5388FB3F.description.1: Then you can build your stone guard. (Similar to building iron golems and building snow golems)
quest.5CA8940C8CE5FF31.subtitle: Do you all only have 10 hearts?
quest.5CA8940C8CE5FF31.description.1: There are the nine grids of the workbench, the relics are placed in position 5, and the heart pieces are placed in positions 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, and 9, and then the relics can be repaired for durability~
quest.638674D5F26E0FCB.subtitle: 9 heart pieces can be used to craft puzzle master
quest.638674D5F26E0FCB.description.2: Go to an open space in the wild and put this block down
quest.638674D5F26E0FCB.description.3: After dropping it, right click at it and move it two blocks down to generate a game block (random, Minesweeper or Game of Light). Yes, that's right, instead of disappearing, it will run down two blocks.
quest.638674D5F26E0FCB.description.4: With this displacement, you might as well place the puzzle master in the air.
quest.6CE0F53AD6F032C2.title: Trigger and observe Minesweeper block
quest.6CE0F53AD6F032C2.subtitle: old game
quest.6CE0F53AD6F032C2.description.1: Once the Minesweeper game starts, you can activate it by left-clicking on the smart panel, or right-clicking on the flag to mark the minefield.
quest.4BAA13005306C831.title: Trigger and observe Game of Light block
quest.4BAA13005306C831.subtitle: test memory
quest.4BAA13005306C831.description.1: After Game of Light starts, the squares in the game area will flash light. After the flashing is completed, you only need to click the corresponding squares in the order of their flashing.
quest.497A0A4B55C4F817.title: Obtain the godforged block
quest.497A0A4B55C4F817.subtitle: Then you can make an enchanting table
quest.3F50BD2C51C04E9D.title: Atum Relics
quest.3F50BD2C51C04E9D.subtitle: Get some water!
quest.3F50BD2C51C04E9D.description.1: There is a chance to obtain it by throwing a dirty ring into the water.
quest.3F50BD2C51C04E9D.description.2: Go to dig the pyramids of the pharaohs more!
chapter.dtd.1EC4B8B87DEDDB7B.title: Useful Knowledge
quest.53215649212848EC.subtitle: This chapter is written because the FTB Teams GUI is temporarily unavailable
quest.53215649212848EC.description.1: Use   /ftbteams party create yourteamname   to create team
quest.53215649212848EC.description.2: A space should be added after create, and the team name should be entered after the space (any name, no error is ok)
task.dtd.2DBB35F9DCB3309C.title: Create Team
quest.488435B0667C6BAA.description.1: Use   /ftbteams party invite username   to invite others to join your team
quest.488435B0667C6BAA.description.2: A space should be added after invite,and the username should be entered after the space,or just @a to invite all players
quest.488435B0667C6BAA.description.3: to kick, just replace invite with kick
task.dtd.483E5E1FE69A9344.title: Invite Others
quest.3A3D58717C582F98.description.1: During blood moon, the amount of monsters spawned is very large. If you are worried that the computer performance is not enough, the computer freezes and the game experience is uncomfortable during the blood moon, or even the game crashes because there are too many monsters, you can execute this command to skip the blood moon
quest.3A3D58717C582F98.description.2: This command also resets the chapter “Useful Knowledge”
task.dtd.077A8E8A66780D71.title: Blood Moon
task.dtd.1A5E79383F2987AD.title: Multiplayer
quest.6D5E7FBE8230C0D7.subtitle: Map Mod
quest.6D5E7FBE8230C0D7.description.1: FTBChunks is the map mod selected by this modpack. Press M to view the full screen map. Press T to directly teleport, and press T to the entity to teleport to the location of the entity
quest.6D5E7FBE8230C0D7.description.2: The settings of the minimap are located at the gear icon in the lower right corner of the full screen map, click in and find the “minimap” option and you can modify it.
quest.6D5E7FBE8230C0D7.description.3: Claim chunks botton is located at upper left corner, you can claim chunks by left click, and right click to cancel it. Press shift and left click chunks to load chunks forcibly.
quest.6D5E7FBE8230C0D7.description.4: The location point button in the upper left corner is used to create a new location point at the current location. In addition, right-clicking on the full screen map can also create a location point.
quest.6D5E7FBE8230C0D7.description.5: The globe icon in the lower left corner is used to switch the dimensions displayed on the map.
quest.6D5E7FBE8230C0D7.description.6: For why the dragon of ice and fire does not show, you need to set “minimap - show large entities” in the settings to True.
task.dtd.0FE17C27690CFEF6.title: FTB Chunks

chapter.dtd.27C57016C1BA0A13.title: What happened to this world?
quest.dtd.5DA60203F1A47B25.title: Thanks for playing DTD（NOT DDT）
quest.dtd.5DA60203F1A47B25.subtitle: Here's a bunch of notes
task.dtd.3CAEDA135515BA14.title: Click me for the best gaming experience
quest.dtd.595A7C9110141C07.title: Akashic Tome
quest.dtd.595A7C9110141C07.subtitle: Did you read carefully?
quest.595A7C9110141C07.description.1: The book in the Akashic Tome is not without a name, you need to select it then its name will be showed.
quest.595A7C9110141C07.description.2: Also, if you have selected a book in the Akashic Tome, hold it and left-click on the air to return to the Akashic Tome state.
task.dtd.57F081FF9C5EDCDF.title: My Honey, click on me
quest.dtd.5F2FC6C7792586EC.subtitle: Carrot version~
quest.5F2FC6C7792586EC.description.1: Eat well and increase your life value!
task.dtd.373A0B8445018F59.title: Spice of Life
quest.dtd.77D762E50C1442CF.title: Enhance Armaments
quest.dtd.77D762E50C1442CF.subtitle: cnlimiter my hero
quest.77D762E50C1442CF.description.1: Hold with press K or press K at the weapon in the backpack to enhance the armaments
quest.77D762E50C1442CF.description.2: The quality of the armaments is also the effect of Enhanced Armaments Reload. These qualities do not increase the damage of your weapons, but the damage of the active skills in the K page (see the damage multiplier below)
quest.77D762E50C1442CF.description.3: Active skills will trigger when you attack, and the probability is also stated.
task.dtd.2CCF0636D3744CC7.title: Drop my weapon!
quest.dtd.65985CDCBC83469D.subtitle: My hero
quest.65985CDCBC83469D.description.1: Craft conflict? When polymorphic craft, you can click the button above to select the craft result, pay attention.
task.dtd.3A6BE102CA3D15F6.title: Polymorph
quest.dtd.055D1A9BD2501583.subtitle: My blood limit has been reduced!
quest.055D1A9BD2501583.description.1: keepInventory is turned off by default （of course, you can turn it on by using command）, remember to return to the place of death, pick up the soul crystal, and restore the lost health.
task.dtd.721F948CD3060732.title: About keepInventory
quest.dtd.529A70917C58DBF2.subtitle: /ftbbackups start manual backup~
quest.529A70917C58DBF2.description.1: .minecraft/versions/DTD/backups There are save backups in the folder.
task.dtd.07920DEC81B46F50.title: Need to roll back?
quest.7C4772D20BF18CB4.description.1: Press c to select an occupation.
quest.7C4772D20BF18CB4.description.3: Drink Mundane Potion to reset the occupation.
task.dtd.67DCEA918BB77650.title: Choose a Occupation
quest.dtd.4CF2F4B58F0B8739.subtitle: Are you sure it's not hair?
quest.4CF2F4B58F0B8739.description.1: Sometimes, mob wear hats on top of their heads
quest.4CF2F4B58F0B8739.description.2: Killing them will unlock the hat
quest.4CF2F4B58F0B8739.description.3: Press H to activate the hat GUI and wear your own hat!
task.dtd.624AEDA3E8754B42.title: HATTTTTTTTTTT!
quest.dtd.732E2F9815F46812.title: Time to Sleep
quest.dtd.732E2F9815F46812.subtitle: Wish u have a good night
quest.732E2F9815F46812.description.1: As you fall asleep, the passage of time is accelerated, and the day begins in a smoother and more natural way.
task.dtd.7B2DE2DD8DA35BBB.title: Sleep
quest.dtd.3874D8351F7EB03C.subtitle: MCMOD百科
quest.3874D8351F7EB03C.description.1: In the game, move the mouse to the item （in JEI） and press the "I" key （the key position can be adjusted）, the mod will open the system default browser and jump to the item page.
quest.3874D8351F7EB03C.description.2: MCMOD百科's information is time-sensitive and may not be accurate. Please be cautious when referring to it.
task.dtd.6C1DC27163A0E8F2.title: Data Search
quest.dtd.050BFE1322D77784.subtitle: Has the enchanttable been banned?
quest.050BFE1322D77784.description.1: Don't be confused all day long, that this item can't be used and that item can't be used, as if it's all banned. When the time comes, it will be available to you.
task.dtd.2C36C9D1F10DB0ED.title: Game Stage
quest.dtd.4E7340A47410D178.subtitle: Where did it go?
quest.4E7340A47410D178.description.1: The (vanilla) mobspawner can spawn up to 8 mobs.
task.dtd.700692ABEC699F16.title: The maximum limit for spawning monsters
quest.3A3D58717C582F98.description.6: The blood moon spawns a lot of monsters. If you are worried that the computer configuration is not enough, you experience a blood moon, or even the game crashes because there are too many monsters, you can execute this command to skip the blood moon.
quest.3A3D58717C582F98.description.7: This command also resets this chapter.
tooltip.dtd.enchanting_table: You need to defeat the pharaoh and put the artifact loot into your inventory to use the enchanting table.
dimstage.dtd.twilightforest: To enter Twilight Forest, you will need to kill the Arachnarch and the Starlit Crusher and put their trophies into your inventory.
dimstage.dtd.the_nether: You need to kill the pharaoh and put his artifact into your inventory to enter the Nether.
dimstage.dtd.everbright: You'll need to kill the Netherite Monstrosity and put its drop Infernal Forge into your inventory to enter the Everbright.
dimstage.dtd.everdawn: You'll need to kill the Netherite Monstrosity and put its drop Infernal Forge into your inventory to enter the Everdawn.
gamestage.dtd.description.three: You have gained access to the Nether.
gamestage.dtd.description.five: You have gained access to the Everbright and the Everdawn.
gamestage.dtd.description.twotwiliforest: You have gained access to the Twilight Forest.
